entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
